mod.name: The Mystic
mod.credits:
Artists: 
  RedDyeNo5 (https://twitter.com/RedDyeNo5/media) for 6 relics: Spellbook, Blessed Book, Crystal Ball, Training Manual, Rabbit's Foot, and Bent Spoon. 
 Translators: 
 IrisRaphael(猫妖爱丽丝拉斐尔) and Orakur(昂拉克) for translation to Chinese(simplified)
mod.description:
Mystic v0.16.0 change notes: 
 
 -Haste: X cost, gain "Haste" for X(+1) turns. Haste power is a temporary version of the previous effects of Haste. 
 -Arcane Accuracy: renamed to "Metamagic", Gain 2(3) "Spellpower". Spellpower increases the damage and block of spells. 
 -Mighty Magic: renamed to "Bladework", Gain 2(3) "Technique". Technique increases the damage and block of artes. 
 -Power Slash: now grants 1 extra stack of Poise. 
 -Snowball: now grants 1 extra stack of Power. 
 -Magic Missile: Upgrade changed from +1 damage to "extra hits for each stack of poise". 
 -Energized Rift: reworked: Shuffle 1 (Upgraded) Cantrip into your draw pile for each stack of poise. 
 -Divining blow: change "Powerful: draw 2 cards" to "Powerful: draw 1 card for each stack of Power". 
 -Pure Instinct: add new effect: for 2(3) turns, Strikes count as Artes. 
 -Components Pouch: add new effect: for 2(3) turns, Defends count as Spells. 
 -All-In: reduce damage to 10(13), upgrade no longer reduces duration, duration reduces with stacks of power. 
 -Illusion of Calm: reduce block to 12(16), upgrade no longer reduces duration, duration reduces with stacks of poise. 
 -Spellstrike: upgrade no longer increases damage, upgrade card to no longer exhaust on use. 
 -Dedication: rework: now 3 cost, 1/1 str/dex, upgrade to 2/2 str/dex, upgrade any number of times. 
 -Grapple: Change to Stun target enemy (now requires StSlib) 
 -Vorpal Thrust: increase upgraded damage to 16, rework powerful effect to "increase base damage by 50% for each stack of power". 
 -Discipline: upgrade changed to "two power and poise" instead of 1 cost.  
 -Arcane Dodge: Upgraded version changed from 5(+7) block to 7(+5) block. 
  -Feat keyword: Changed to "Can only be played as the first Arte of the turn". 
 -Cantrip keyword: Changed to "Counts as a spell so long as you have fewer than 2 stacks of Power".

cards.name: Acid Splash
cards.description:
mysticmod:Cantrip.
Deal 3 damage. Draw a card.

cards.name: Acid Splash+
cards.description:
mysticmod:Cantrip.
Deal 5 damage. Draw a card.

cards.name: Blade Burst

Exhaust.

cards.name: Blade Burst+

mysticmod:Cantrip.
Gain 2 Block. Draw a card.

Draw a card, then gain [E] if the card is a [#5299DC]Spell[] or an [#FF5252]Arte[].

For the first [#5299DC]Spell[] and [#FF5252]Arte[] you play each turn, play a random card of the other type from your draw pile.
Ethereal.

cards.description:
Gain 1 Intangible.
Exhaust, Ethereal.
[#FF5252]Poised[]: Does not Exhaust if you played 1 [#FF5252]Arte[] this turn.

cards.name: Haste
cards.description: For X turns, draw 1 card, gain [E] , deal 1 more damage with your attacks, and gain 1 more Block from your cards.

cards.name: Knowledge Pool

Choose one of 3 random [#5299DC]Spell[] cards and add it to your hand. it costs 0 this turn.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Knowledge Pool+
cards.description:
Choose one of 3 random [#5299DC]Spell[] cards and add it to your hand. it costs 0 this turn.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Lunge
cards.description:
Gain [E] [E].
Draw 2 cards.
Lose 4 Dexterity this turn.
Exhaust. mysticmod:Feat.

cards.name: Lunge+
cards.description:
Gain [E] [E] [E].
Draw 2 cards.
Lose 4 Dexterity this turn.
Exhaust. mysticmod:Feat.

cards.name: Mirror Entity
cards.description: [#5299DC]Spells[] and [#FF5252]Artes[] also advance next turn's [#5299DC]Power[] and [#FF5252]Poise[] counters.

cards.name: Mirror Entity+

cards.name: Momentum
cards.description: [#5299DC]Spells[] and [#FF5252]Artes[] deal more damage and gain more Block for each stack of [#FF5252]Poise[] or [#5299DC]Power[] respectively.

cards.name: Momentum+
cards.description: [#5299DC]Spells[] and [#FF5252]Artes[] deal more damage and gain more Block for each stack of [#FF5252]Poise[] or [#5299DC]Power[] respectively.

cards.name: Mystical Shield
cards.description: Block is reduced to 8 instead of 0 at the start of your turn.

cards.name: Mystical Shield+
cards.description: Block is set to 8 instead of 0 at the start of your turn.

cards.name: Natural 20
cards.description:
Your next Attack this turn does double damage.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Natural 20+
cards.description: Your next Attack this turn does double damage.

cards.name: Obscuring Mist
cards.description:
Gain 15 Block.
[#FF5252]Poised[]: Gain 1 Artifact.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Obscuring Mist+

Gain 15 Block.
[#FF5252]Poised[]: Gain 2 Artifact.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Spell Recall
cards.description:
Return a [#5299DC]Spell[] from your discard pile to your hand.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Spell Recall+
cards.description: Return a [#5299DC]Spell[] from your discard pile to your hand.

cards.name: Spellstrike
cards.description:
Deal 8 damage.
Search your draw pile for an Attack [#5299DC]Spell[] and play it.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Spellstrike+
cards.description:
Deal 8 damage.
Search your draw pile for an Attack [#5299DC]Spell[] and play it.

cards.name: Spontaneous Caster
cards.description:
Whenever you play a [#5299DC]Spell[], exhaust it and add a random [#5299DC]Spell[] to your discard pile.
All [#5299DC]Spells'[] costs are reduced to [E] .

cards.name: Spontaneous Caster+
cards.description:
Innate.
Whenever you play a [#5299DC]Spell[], exhaust it and add a random [#5299DC]Spell[] to your discard pile.
All [#5299DC]Spells'[] costs are reduced to [E] .

relics.name: Spell Book
relics.description: At the start of each combat, add a random mysticmod:Cantrip to your hand.
relics.flavorText: A special tome unique to every caster. Contains records of spells that only the writer understands.

relics.name: Training Manual
relics.description: At the start of each combat, add a random Arte to your hand
relics.flavorText: An instructional booklet containing illustrated diagrams for various fighting styles. The handwriting is oddly familiar.

relics.name: Rabbit's Foot
relics.description: Whenever you play an Arte, Gain 1 block.
relics.flavorText: Said to bring good luck to its holder.

relics.name: Runic Prism
relics.description: Whenever you play a Spell, deal 3 damage to a random enemy.
relics.flavorText: The dark side of the moon god.

relics.name: Kama
relics.description: Every fifth card you play, gain 1 Strength if that card was an Arte, and gain 1 Dexterity if that card was a Spell.
relics.flavorText: Commonly used to reap wheat and souls.

relics.name: Blessed Book
relics.description: Replaces SpellBook. Every 2 turns, add a random mysticmod:Cantrip to your hand.
relics.flavorText: A powerful Spell Book enchanted with mysterious magics.

relics.name: Crystal Ball
relics.description: All non Arte skills are Spells, and all non Spell attacks are Artes.
relics.flavorText: Cannot interface with Palantír, Pensieves, Scryballs, Gramerhain, Shiral crystals, or Urim and Thummim

relics.name: Deck Of Many Things
relics.description: Gain [E] at the start of each turn. At the end of each turn, if you did not play two Spells and two Artes, lose 2 HP.
relics.flavorText: It's a mystery why anyone would represent magical effects as a deck of cards.

relics.name: Bent Spoon
relics.description: mysticmod:Cantrips deal 1 additional damage and Gain 1 additional Block.
relics.flavorText: What Lee doesn't want you to know is that there is no spoon.

potions.name: Essence Of Magic
potions.description: Add 2 random Cantrips to your hand.

keywords.name: Mysticmod:cantrip
keywords.description: Considered a Spell so long as you have fewer than 2 stacks of Power.

keywords.name: Mysticmod:feat
keywords.description: Can only be played as the first Arte of the turn.

keywords.name: Mysticmod:spellpower
keywords.description: Increases the Block gained from and damage dealt by Spells.

keywords.name: Mysticmod:stoneskin
keywords.description: Gives 2 block at the start of each turn. This block is affected by any block-affecting powers.

keywords.name: Mysticmod:technique
keywords.description: Increases the Block gained from and damage dealt by Artes.
